title: Among The Sleep (Latest Version) (Native) (GOG)
description:
Hey guys, here "Among the sleep" with the 1.10 patch. This is the official mac version of the game. OSX 10.7 or higher is required. It includes all the bonus content as well. Hope you guys enjoy and please help seed.


---------------------


Among the Sleep (1.10 Patch Notes)


Changelog: 

General 

- An option to hide the crosshair dot has been added 

- Added fast-forward option to credits. This can be activated by using 

standard movement keys/gamepad buttons 

- Fixed hints and subtitles sometimes being completely black 

- Fixed look-at-hands animation playing if opening the menu while sliding 

- Made rotating cranks and valves significantly easier 

- Made the long drawer a lot more stable 

- Fixed several locations where geometry would disappear when it 
shouldnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t (Occlusion culling) 

- Fixed bug where animation for climbing last pipe in closet level 
started too late 

- Fixed timing on some events 

- Added collision to some bottles in cabinets in the home level 

- Updated version of AI middleware (RAIN) 

- Fixed an issue where Teddy could block the player in the home level 

- Improved sound in certain areas of the game 

Virtual Reality 

- Resolution selection in VR mode has been unlocked 

- Fixed an issue where multiple cursors were shown in the main 
menu/in-game menu in VR mode 

- Added a configurable key binding for resetting VR device orientation 

- Mother and cake now have correct collision in the intro, which fixed 
wrong depth on VR cursor 


-----------------------

Bonus content included for FREE with purchase: 

- 18 Artworks 

- Wallpaper


-----------------------


What's cool about it:

- The perspective of a two year old child. YouÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re small, vulnerable and helpless. But you can also crawl into small places to hide. Seeing your own hands crawling frantically under the couch makes you feel even more fragile.

- Focused on story, not cheap scares. Merging a childÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s perception of reality with its wild imagination, lets you unravel what is actually causing your own fear and confusion.

- Oculus Rift support. For the VR-fanatics, this feature will make sure you get as close to being a child again as you can.


Overview:


Among the Sleep is a first person horror adventure, in which you play as a two year old child. After waking up in the middle of the night to mysterious sounds, you start a journey in the dark looking for your mother.

The game lets you experience the horror felt by a child when familiar and friendly surroundings are transformed into something sinister. While wandering around in surrealistic environments, you have only your teddy bear as a companion. There might be threats hiding in every shadow, but thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s no traditional combat. Instead, you will actively have to find places to hide and avoid confrontation in order to survive. In Among the Sleep youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re vulnerable, scared, and trying to make sense of the world. Dark things will happen. How will you find comfort?
